Key Match Events: Giannis Antetokounmpo hit two free throws to give the Bucks a 102-100 lead
Anfernee Simons was fouled on a scoring drive and completed the three-point play, giving Portland a 103-102 lead with 23.5 seconds remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was closely contested with the Bucks almost tying it but failing in the end
